DOC.brief_summary: The aim fitting study evaluate clinical performance different hydrogel silicone hydrogel contact lenses .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Hydrogels v Silicone Hydrogel Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: This 20-subject , double mask , randomize , contra lateral , 2-day non-dispensing fitting trial .
DOC.criteria: A person eligible inclusion study he/she : Is 18 40 year age ( inclusive ) Has selfreported visual exam last two year Is adapted soft contact lens wearer Has cl spherical prescription 1.00 6.00 ( inclusive ) Has spectacle cylinder 0.75D ( diopter ) eye Is correctable visual acuity 20/25 good eye Has clear cornea active ocular disease Has read , understood sign information consent letter Is willing comply wear schedule Is willing comply visit schedule A person exclude study he/she : Has never wear contact lenses Currently wear rigid gas permeable contact lenses Has history achieve comfortable contact lens wear ( 5 day per week ; > 8 hours/day ) Has contact lens prescription outside range 1.00 6.00D Has spectacle cylinder â‰¥ 1.00D cylinder either eye Has best correct spectacle distance vision worse 20/25 either eye Has systemic topical medication affect ocular health Has ocular pathology severe insufficiency lacrimal secretion Has persistent , clinically significant corneal conjunctival staining Has active neovascularization central corneal scar Is aphakic Is presbyopic Has undergone corneal refractive surgery Is participate type eye related conical research study
